item.description: A gentleman is a story about Gaurav who is on a mission to settle down.

item.title: Badrinath ki Dulhania
item.description: Badrinath Bansal from Jhansi and Vaidehi Trivedi from Kota belong to small towns but have diametrically opposite opinions on everything.

item.title: Badrinath ki Dulhania
item.description: Badrinath Bansal from Jhansi and Vaidehi Trivedi from Kota belong to small towns but have diametrically opposite opinions on everything.

item.title: From Romantic Dramas to Fresh New Genres, How Bollywood has evolved
item.description: There was a time, not long ago, when Bollywood was synonymous to romantic movies where protagonists danced around trees and ran towards each other in slow-mo, while the wind blew their hair dramatically.

item.title: Gender Pay Gap in Bollywood & Why Deepika Padukone Called It Out
item.description: Aren’t Priyanka Chopra & Deepika Padukone as bankable as Ranbir Kapoor and Ranveer Singh, if not more?

item.title: Our obsession for Celebrity Weddings
item.description: A wedding wave has been engulfing us ever since Virushka got married in December 2017.

item.title: Raees
item.description: Raees is running an illegal liquor business in Gujarat.

item.title: Raees
item.description: Raees is running an illegal liquor business in Gujarat.

item.title: Spotlight: Kangana Ranaut
item.description: Call her Queen, Datto, Simran or Manikarnika, the feisty and daring Kangana Ranaut has created her own glorious niche in Bollywood.

item.title: Spotlight: Taapsee Pannu
item.description: The loud-heart, the feisty and the ever-empowered Taapsee Pannu has won our hearts with her fierce roles and fearless persona.

item.title: Top 3 Character artists in Bollywood
item.description: Character artists like Pran, Anupam Kher and Paresh Rawal laid the foundation for recent stars like Irfan Khan, Nawazuddin Siddiqui and Pankaj Tripathi, proving that most movies would be nothing without their strong and brilliant performances that add an edge to various storylines.

item.title: Top 3 Unconventional Leading Actors Of Bollywood Today
item.description: The last few years of Bollywood have given us unconventional movies, which incorporated unconventional actors, who have hereby successfully proved that it’s not all about the songs, the dance or the good looks; it only comes down to the most basic reason for the existence of cinema - the art of acting and entertainment.

item.title: We Choose Sara Ali Khan Over Janhvi Kapoor. Here’s Why.
item.description: In 2018, Janhvi Kapoor stepped into Bollywood with Dhadak and Sara Ali Khan with Kedarnath, making glorious yet humble beginnings in our mighty industry.

item.title: All you need to know about Karan Johar’s dream project Kalank
item.description: Karan Johar has a penchant for multi-starrers. Perhaps just one star-kid can’t be trusted with a big budget movie, right?
